title: 【急】Rpgitems插件崩溃
author: wangwenxinx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wangwenxinx 于 2015-1-8 19:27 编辑 

Rpgitems插件突然崩溃
以前所有东西都导入不了了
但是有那个文件 但是武器导入不进去 不知道为什么

错误报告如下
RPGItems (3.3) ItemManager.load
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot create section at empty path
 at org.apache.commons.lang.Validate.notEmpty(Validate.java:321)

 at think.rpgitems.Plugin.onEnable(Plugin.java:113)
 at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:217)
 at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:457)
 at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.enablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:382)
 at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_6_R2.CraftServer.loadPlugin(CraftServer.java:286)

 at net.minecraft.server.v1_6_R2.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:582)
